Description: Limestone ostracon: on one side only, a sketch drawing in black ink of a donkey's head; on the upper left a small sketch of a monkey's head.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: E. Brunner-Traut, 'Die altägyptischen Scherbenbilder’ (Wiesbaden, 1956), p.6 (mentioned only).
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2013, Apr - Jul, Paris, Louvre, L'Art Du Contour 2013/2014, Sept - Jan, Musée royaux d’art et d’histoire, Brussels, L'Art Du Contour
Acquisition name: Donated by: Maj Robert Grenville Gayer-Anderson
